about_the_game:
Down Further is an exploration-based, point-and-click horror game set in the deepest areas of the ocean. In a worldwide maritime war, the only "safe" places to travel are the trenches. Use whatever devices your vessel has to fend off whatever you encounter down there.


Explore


Navigate the tunnels of the ocean while gathering data and moving supply shipments. Research shipwrecks, build up supplies, and upgrade your submarine to handle further parts of the ocean.


Survive


Wield a horn, sonar, and other rusty technology to keep the goliaths at bay. The further down into the ocean you get, the more dangerous the creatures become.


Listen


Understand the world above with the intel from below. See how maritime war has shaped the world of science and learn the deepest secrets.

short_description: Explore the deepest parts of the ocean in this open-world, survival horror game. Fend off unknown creatures with only a few damaged devices in your submarine. Collect creature data, upgrade your vessel, and escape the deep ocean trenches in Down Further.
